data.title: Aoyama Gakuin University
data.meta_description: Swinburne has a student exchange arrangement with Aoyama Gakuin University. Learn more about courses available, semester dates, credit equivalency and how to apply.
data.text:
Swinburne has a student exchange arrangement with Aoyama Gakuin University. Learn more about courses available, semester dates, credit equivalency and how to apply.

Institution name

Aoyama Gakuin University

Location

Tokyo, Japan

Semester dates

Semester 1 (Spring Semester): April - August

Semester 2 (Fall Semester): September - February

Academic calendar

Discipline area

Aoyama campus

Business

Cultural and Creative studies

Economics

Education

International Politics

Japanese studies

Law

Literature

Psychology

Sagamihara campus

Engineering

Global studies

Japanese studies

Science

Important notes to consider

Aoyama Gakuin University is a competitive destination. As such, please put careful consideration into choosing your second and third preference as back-up options.

Students applying to AGU need to meet the following requirements:

Completed at least 1 year of study at Swinburne (in their current degree) at the time of application;

Have a minimum 2.5 GPA (very strict requirement)

Japanese language requirements

Aoyama campus

Japanese proficiency is not required if students are only taking English-taught courses.

Sagamihara campus

For College of Science & Engineering or College of Community Studies; or School of Social Informatics: you must have studied Japanese for more than 1 year, and have Japanese language ability equivalent to the N5 JLPT.

For School of Global Studies and Collaboration: Japanese proficiency is not required if students are only taking English-taught courses. If you are studying any classes in Japanese, then you must have studied Japanese for more than 1 year, and have Japanese language ability equivalent to the N5 JLPT.

Courses available for exchange students

Students can study at either the Aoyama campus or the Sagamihara campus.

View course selection

Credit equivalence

18 credits = 50 CP

14 credits = 37.5 CP

Find out more

Accommodation

There is housing available. View the accommodation page for information.

Find out more

Check out the Aoyama Gakuin University website for more information.
